import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Form, Button, Container,Col,Dropdown } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './register.scss' import * as mainActions from '../../Store/Actions/mainActions' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { DASHBOARD_PATH, LOGIN_PATH } from '../../Constants/const' class Register extends Component { state = { email: '', password: '', shufersalUsername: '', shufersalPassword: '', ramiLevyUsername: '', ramiLevyPassword: '', selection: 'Shufersal', sound: true, usernameWifi: '', passwordWifi: '', submitUsername: false, submitPassword: false, } handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); await this.props.register(this.state.email, this.state.password) if (this.props.loggedIn) { this.props.history.push(DASHBOARD_PATH); } } handleChange = event => { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); }; render() { return (

this.handleSubmit(e)} style={{textAlign:"right"}}> דואר אלקטרוני this.handleChange(e)} /> סיסמה this.handleChange(e)} /> {this.state.selection === 'Shufersal' ? 'שופרסל' : 'רמי לוי'} בחר עגלה this.setState({ selection: 'Shufersal' })}>שופרסל this.setState({ selection: 'Rami Levy' })}>רמי לוי

} {this.state.selection !== 'Shufersal' &&

} this.setState({ sound: e.target.checked })} checked={this.state.sound} />

יש לך כבר חשבון? לחץ this.props.history.push(LOGIN_PATH)} className="register-link"> כאן כדי להתחבר

 ); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { loggedIn: state.main.loggedIn } } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return { register: (email, password) => dispatch(mainActions.register(email, password)) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Register);
